title: I can't find my victorious ward skin for some reason.. HELP
body:
Hello guys, I ended up in Platinum for season 7, and I have received awards such as Victorious Graves Chromes and the banner. But, I can't find my Victorious Ward Skin. Like whenever I'm in the champ select, I only see my default skin and my other ward skins. I have received 10 chat restriction before, but I already finished 10 games before season ended. I don't know if that has to do with that, but based on what I read on the Riot's season award's eligibility page, that doesn't seem to be the case.

Any suggestions or help? Thanks.

replies.body: i dont seem to have mine either.

Hey there, the victorious ward was rewarded for climbing silver or higher in more than one ranked queue per the [rewards guide](https://euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/2017-ranked-season-ends).  I do see rewards being granted for solo queue, but I wasn't able to locate placements in another queue.  Let me know if that clears things up!
me too im silver and i heard i can get a  victorius ward skin but dont seem to have it.
